column4: is cpufreqd currently broken? I'm using 11.04, but I'm getting some errors that it can't open /sys/devices/LNXSYSTM:00/device:00/PNP0C0A:00/power_supply/BAT0/current_now
a bunch of those things moved around. you may just want to echo your desired scheduler value into the appropriate /sys/devices/cpu/.../power/ file
I want to lower freq when CPU gets too hot. Otherwise I'm find with ondemand scheduler
